signals.title: Smart Port IoT System for Container Tracking
signals.text:
ABSTRACT:
A smart port system utilizing IoT sensors for real-time container tracking and logistics optimization.

DESCRIPTION:
The invention relates to a comprehensive IoT-based monitoring system designed for maritime port operations.

signals.title: New AI-Powered Crane System Deployed at Rotterdam Port
signals.text: Rotterdam port has unveiled its latest AI-powered crane system designed to improve container handling efficiency by 40%. The system uses computer vision and machine learning algorithms to optimize container placement and reduce turnaround times.

signals.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Port Logistics Optimization
signals.text:
TITLE: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Port Logistics Optimization

AUTHORS: John Smith, Jane Doe

ABSTRACT:
We present a novel deep reinforcement learning approach for optimizing container stacking and retrieval operations in maritime ports.
